name: The First Circle
description:
Made at LaTech's 2017 game jam. The theme was "Dante's Inferno."

-Requires Controller. Works with xbox360/One controller.

-Controls explained in-game.

-Push enemies out of the arena to destroy them. Stay inside arena.

Jesus is back! He's here to rescue his hombres from the first circle of dante's hell. Keep them alive until it's time to ascend! Ward off demons with your super soaker filled with holy water! Don't forget to pump it!

Git Repo: https://github.com/jh318/LaTechJam2017
